protein.specific_function: Calcium-sensitive protein which reversibly blocks the barbed ends of actin filaments but does not sever preformed actin filaments. May play an important role in macrophage function. May play a role in regulating cytoplasmic and/or nuclear structures through potential interactions with actin. May bind DNA

reference.reference_text: Dabiri GA, Young CL, Rosenbloom J, Southwick FS: Molecular cloning of human macrophage capping protein cDNA. A unique member of the gelsolin/villin family expressed primarily in macrophages. J Biol Chem. 1992 Aug 15;267(23):16545-52.
